duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet and exceed overall sales objectives within the assigned geography.
Successfully launch new product and service offerings.
Effectively balance a broad portfolio to ensure sales opportunities to achieve territory and business needs.
Consistently demonstrate Solution Selling capabilities and build effective relationships with customers.
Develop and execute an annual Territory Business Plan that leverages industry insights, strategies, and tactics.
Utilize Zoetis resources to maximize ROI and identify account growth opportunities.
Work with all Zoetis colleagues in a professional manner and conduct quarterly business reviews with managers.
Ability to work in cross-functional team-based environments and through a variety of platforms.
Successfully complete extensive product and industry Learning and Development curriculum developed by Zoetis and exhibit willingness to accept and incorporate feedback.
Exhibit through and attention to detail, manage assigned expense budgets, and contribute strategically to sales performance.
Customer focused, articulate complex concepts, maintain professional demeanor and presentation style, and manage goals and priorities effectively.
Demonstrated ability to work independently and in a close team environment.
Computer skills including MS Office, Outlook, and ability to learn Zoetis systems.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree (BS/BA) preferred; Associate degree required.
